name: Sleep Over
description:
Sleepover is a game for two players in which you will have to eliminate the opponent by throwing sparks or pushing them off the map. The player has 2 attacks: sparks or pillow attack.
▪ Sparks: for using this attack, the player will have to move around the map to fill the Energy Bar. When this bar is full, he will be able to attack once with the sparks.
▪ Pillow attack: with this attack, the player can block the enemy’s sparks, and if the pillow impacts with the other player, he will push the opponent.
